item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, October 12, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Tesla shares fall after Musk’s glitzy ‘Cybercab’ event disappoints
2. Boeing to cut 17,000 jobs and delay 777X jet as revenues fall short
3. Obama says Black men’s support for Trump is ‘not acceptable’
4. Canadian pension fund director who charged £11,700 to corporate card awarded damages
5. British Airways to axe hundreds of flights over shortage of planes
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, October 12, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
